ai_insights.narrative:
# Data Analysis Summary: env_wat_cat

## Overview
This dataset contains 1,030 observations 
spanning 3 time periods from 2021 to 2023.
Data covers 40 geographic regions.

## Key Statistics
- Average Value: 744.96
- Range: 0.00 to 56126.72
- Standard Deviation: 3341.61

## Insights (3 detected)
1. **Data spans 3 time periods**: Time series from 2021 to 2023
2. **Geographic coverage: 40 regions**: Data available across multiple geographic regions enabling comparison analysis
3. **Value range: 0.00 to 56126.72**: Variance of 56126.72 across dataset

insights.title: Geographic coverage: 40 regions
insights.description: Data available across multiple geographic regions enabling comparison analysis

insights.title: Geographic coverage: 40 regions
insights.description: Data available across multiple geographic regions enabling comparison analysis

visuals.title: Latest Value
visuals.description: Most recent data point with timestamp
visuals.sql: SELECT time, value, geo FROM fact_observations WHERE dataset_code='env_wat_cat' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

visuals.title: Trend Over Time
visuals.description: Historical trend showing evolution over time
visuals.sql:
SELECT time, geo, AVG(value) as value 
                FROM fact_observations 
                WHERE dataset_code='env_wat_cat' 
                GROUP BY time, geo
                ORDER BY time

visuals.title: Year-over-Year Growth Rate
visuals.description: Annual growth rate showing acceleration or deceleration
visuals.sql:
WITH yoy AS (
                    SELECT 
                        time,
                        geo,
                        value,
                        LAG(value) OVER (PARTITION BY geo ORDER BY time) as prev_value
                    FROM fact_observations
                    WHERE dataset_code='env_wat_cat'
                )
                SELECT 
                    time,
                    geo,
                    ((value / NULLIF(prev_value, 0)) - 1) * 100 as growth_rate
                FROM yoy
                WHERE prev_value IS NOT NULL
                ORDER BY time DESC
                LIMIT 20

visuals.title: Geographic Comparison (Latest)
visuals.description: Compare latest values across all regions
visuals.sql:
WITH latest AS (
                    SELECT MAX(time) as max_time 
                    FROM fact_observations 
                    WHERE dataset_code='env_wat_cat'
                )
                SELECT 
                    geo,
                    value
                FROM fact_observations
                WHERE dataset_code='env_wat_cat' 
                    AND time = (SELECT max_time FROM latest)
                ORDER BY value DESC
                LIMIT 30

visuals.title: Top & Bottom Performers
visuals.description: Regions with highest and lowest values
visuals.sql:
WITH latest AS (
                    SELECT MAX(time) as max_time 
                    FROM fact_observations 
                    WHERE dataset_code='env_wat_cat'
                ),
                ranked AS (
                    SELECT 
                        geo,
                        value,
                        time,
                        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY value DESC) as rank_desc,
                        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY value ASC) as rank_asc
                    FROM fact_observations
                    WHERE dataset_code='env_wat_cat' 
                        AND time = (SELECT max_time FROM latest)
                )
                SELECT geo, value, time, 'Top' as category
                FROM ranked
                WHERE rank_desc <= 5
                UNION ALL
                SELECT geo, value, time, 'Bottom' as category
                FROM ranked
                WHERE rank_asc <= 5
                ORDER BY category, value DESC

visuals.title: Value Distribution
visuals.description: Scatter plot showing data distribution pattern
visuals.sql:
SELECT 
                time,
                geo,
                value
            FROM fact_observations
            WHERE dataset_code='env_wat_cat'
            ORDER BY time DESC
            LIMIT 500
